programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Will Make You Pay…You Are The Father!
programme.desc: Is John the father of Rhonda’s daughter? Tiffany won’t marry her fiancé Rio until she knows he’s the father, but he says he is sterile! Then, Wendie wants to prove that James fathered their toddler daughter, but James denies it!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Our 5 Babies Need DNA Tests ... Who's Their Dad?
programme.desc: Seniqua was furious that Prince denied her baby. But when Prince started dating her sister, the fireworks really started. Megan wants Eric to be a father to the daughter he denies.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The Lie Detector Reveals Family Sex Secrets
programme.desc: Makeeba sacrificed everything to be with Carlos, but is her prince charming really a cheater? And is Penny's much younger husband cheating behind her back? Plus Kaylee says the wedding is off if her fiance Jason is cheating.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: If You Cheated With My Teen Cousin ... It's Over!
programme.desc: ON today's MAURY ... Damian says that he found a shocking video on the internet of his fiance having sex. Now he's here to find out if she really is cheater and whether he's the real father of her child. She swears he's just seeing things and that she's been nothing but faithful, but what will her lie detector and paternity tests reveal? Then, Nina swears that her boyfriend Jessie is having sex with one of her own family members. Jessie says that it's all in her head, but will the shocking lie detector results tear their relationship and her family apart? Don't miss all the drama on today's MAURY!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Cheating Secrets Revealed... I May Be Pregnant By Another Man!
programme.desc: Vera suspects that her boyfriend Bruce has been cheating on her constantly for the past nine years. But will the truth rip their almost decade long relationship apart? Then, Trell's girlfriend says that she has a sex addiction and might be pregnant with another man's child. Trell and his sister are here to find out the truth about her cheating ways and this DNA mystery.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: That's Not My Baby ... I Didn't Get Your Teen Pregnant!
programme.desc: Today on MAURY: Rebecca confronts Alfonzo's denial of fatherhood, Tiffany seeks her baby's true father after revenge, and Amy hopes DNA results will make Gordon accept responsibility. Drama unfolds!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Fiancé or My Best Friend Lying? Test Them Both!
programme.desc: The lie detector results are in and the truth is coming out! These guests say their loved ones are cheating behind their backs. But who cheated? How many times? And can they handle the results? All will be revealed on the today’s explosive MAURY.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Test Will Prove I Don't Have 21 Kids!
programme.desc: Ellen and Claudia return for the third time to find out if Doug is the father. Then, did Valchas father Anisha and Rebeka’s babies? Were Amanda and Felix in a relationship as roommates and is Felix the father of her baby?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Shocking Maury Guests Return…Updates!
programme.desc: You've seen their wild DNA results. You've heard their shocking confessions. But what happened to these unforgettable guests after they left the studio.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Stop Gaslighting Me; Unlock the Phone Before We Get Married
programme.desc: Tonya wants to find out if her fiancé, Brian, is cheating; a 20-year marriage is in a tailspin after the husband is caught with another woman.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Your Cheating Is on Camera; Mom, Please Accept Me
programme.desc: Taylor's fiancé, Eric, has cameras set up all over the house and says he has proof that she's been unfaithful; Jimmy believes he's treated differently by his mother, Amanda, because of his homosexuality.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: 21-Year-Old DNA Mystery; Unlock My Three Phones
programme.desc: Amber learned about her potential father's identity when she turned 16, and Karamo hopes to put her search to a halt with a paternity test; Bernadette is fed up with her girlfriend's incessant accusations of flirting and sleeping with men.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: That's Your Baby, Stop Using Me; Mom, Stop Drinking and Love Me
programme.desc: Danielle and Fred fell in love on the job, but as soon as Danielle got pregnant, Fred accused her of cheating on him; Ja'Quan is fed up with the abuse and physical altercations he has with his mother, Gina.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: How Far Does Your Cheating Go? / Toxic Family: Just Say You're Sorry
programme.desc: Ty-heem suspects girlfriend Monique's infidelity after finding a stain. Shequita seeks closure with absentee mother Connie for raising her and sister Temeekia alone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Where Did I Go Wrong With My Kids? / Unlock: Can We Make It Down The Aisle?
programme.desc: On Karamo, Gerri feels disrespected by her children and seeks help to understand why. Meanwhile, William, 26 years older than his fiancée China, faces her doubts about his fidelity and her demand to unlock his phone before marriage.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Who Is Calling In The Middle Of The Night? / Dad, Unblock Me… Please!
programme.desc: Theisa claims that her husband vanishes at all hours of the night. Next, Kimaya says her father Marvin degrades her. Kimaya’s mother, Tamika, believes that Marvin is suffering the effects of childhood trauma.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: This Is Not My Child / Mom, Why Can't You Accept Me?
programme.desc: Today on Karamo, Harold questioned whether or not he is the father of Kanijah’s son. Then, Dakotah believes that the relationship with his mother, TJ, changed for the worse when he revealed he is gay.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are All 4 Babies Mine?/ Update: Mom And Daughter In Distress
programme.desc: The day Diamond revealed she was going to have his child, was the same day that he got his ex pregnant.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Plus Size Model Confronts Her Online Troll
programme.desc: Shawntel is fed up with her ex-friend Christian fat shaming her on social media! He says it's tough love.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Internet Rejects Our Open Adoption!
programme.desc: Ashley and Steven want to adopt another child, but Ashley’s mother wants her to try and carry a child herself.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Stop Blaming Us for Dad's Death
programme.desc: Since the devastating loss of her husband, Anita’s relationship with her daughters has been splintered.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: 42 Years Later; My Ex-BFF Wants to Be Me
programme.desc: Denise fears that her out-of-control daughter will wind up incarcerated or dead; Melanie spoiled her fiancé, Dakota, with all kinds of lavish gifts, but now she thinks he's cheating and has called off their engagement until Karamo unlocks his phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: I Took the Wrong Baby Home; Unlock: Broken Phone and Promises
programme.desc: Raylene believes that her real daughter was switched at birth and that Undrea isn't hers; Servilia says her fiancé, I'sun, is spending too much time at the bus stop meeting women, and she's caught him sexting other women.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help! My Daughter Is Naked On The Internet / DNA: Someone Else Was In My Bed!
programme.desc: Kristie is shocked by a video of Erica and her boyfriend, Cullen, while Erica resents her interference; Jamaine, suspicious of Alicia's fidelity, doubts he's the father of her son.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: 17 Years Without My Mother & Father
programme.desc: On Karamo, Tyrill is a 17 year old who never knew who his father is. But today, Tyrill gets to meet a man named Steven, which is presumed to be his father.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Stopped Cheating; Unlock My Phone To Prove It/ DNA Mystery: Are You My Sister?
programme.desc: Kayla had just come out of a toxic relationship when she met her boyfriend. But she made a big mistake.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Is She Still Talking to her One-Night Stand?
programme.desc: Jaylinn wants to unlock Aaron's phone after rumors about him led to cheating, pregnancy and even drug use.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Stop Disappearing in the Middle of the Night
programme.desc: Renee believed her fiancé was everything she dreamed of, until he got a second chance in the music industry.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm 25… DNA Will Prove this 50 Year Old is my Baby's Dad
programme.desc: Will 25 year old Katrina prove that 50 year old Christopher fathered her baby and silence his new fiancé?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm 44...Is my 21 Year Old Wife Cheating on Me Again?
programme.desc: Montrice doesn’t feel bad for keeping mum about whose man she’s been sleeping with. Plus, Amber thinks Shawn is sleeping with her sister! A 48-year old will confront her 51-year-old best friend that she’s sleeping with her 21-year old man!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: We're 15, 16, and 17 … Are You Our Babies Father?
programme.desc: Tameeka was thrilled to be pregnant, until she found out Brandon was married. Then, Amanda, age 15, says Anthony is the father but he denies it. Later, John says there is no way he is the father because she's been sleeping with his teenage son.
